name: Berkshires Capital Investors
overview:
The Berkshires Capital Investors provide capital and guidance to visionary entrepreneurs building innovative companies in Western Massachusetts. The Berkshires Capital Investors (BCI) is a regionally focused venture capital fund specializing in seed and early-stage equity investments in emerging technology companies. They are based in Williamstown, MA, and invest throughout Western Massachusetts. BCI is the original fund in the Village Ventures Network of regional, early-stage venture capital funds.

Their objectives:

  • Generate exceptional returns for their Limited Partners
  • Support an exciting community of high-growth technology and service companies

Since its formation in 1997, BCI has helped transform Western Massachusetts’ economy from its reliance on manufacturing, defense and tourism to a technology driven economy. The Williamstown - North Adams area has been dubbed “Silicon Village” and named one of the nation’s technology “Up and Comers” by the Wall Street Journal. They work closely with entrepreneurs, leveraging the region’s rich intellectual capital base, strong entrepreneurial spirit, and low cost of doing business to create successful high-growth companies.
